member.name: IDXGISurface2.GetResource
member.summary: Gets the parent resource and subresource index that support a subresource surface.
member.param: The globally unique identifier (GUID) of the requested interface type.
A pointer to a buffer that receives a pointer to the parent resource object for the subresource surface.
A pointer to a variable that receives the index of the subresource surface.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns one of the following values:

item.description: E_NOINTERFACE if the object does not implement the GUID that the riid parameter specifies.
Possibly other error codes that are described in the DXGI_ERROR topic.

member.name: IDXGISurface2
member.summary: The IDXGISurface2 interface extends the interface by adding support for subresource surfaces and getting a handle to a shared resource.
